name: UIBarMetrics
desc: Constants to specify metrics to use for appearance.

items.name: case `default`
items.desc: Specifies default metrics for the device.

items.name: case compact
items.desc: Specifies metrics when using the phone idiom.

items.name: case defaultPrompt
items.desc: Specifies default metrics for the device for bars with the prompt property, such as UINavigationBar and UISearchBar.

items.name: case compactPrompt
items.desc: Specifies metrics for bars with the prompt property when using the phone idiom, such as UINavigationBar and UISearchBar.
